### D3 in the Console: blue circles {-}
<a href="https://github.com/jtr13/d3book/edit/master/solutions.Rmd" target="_blank"><i class="fa fa-edit"></i></a>

previous step (attach data): 
d3.select("svg").selectAll("circle").data([100,150,200,250,300,350]);

Step 1:
d3.selectAll("circle").transition().duration(2000).attr("cx", "400");

Step 2:
d3.selectAll("circle").transition().duration(2000).attr("cx", "40").attr("fill","green");

Step 3:
d3.select("#Tracy").transition().duration(2000).attr("cx", "400");

Step 4:
d3.selectAll("circle").transition().duration(2000).attr("cx", "200");
d3.selectAll("circle").transition().duration(2000).attr("cy", "175");

return to origin version:  
d3.select("svg").selectAll("circle").transition().duration(2000).attr("cy", d =>d).attr("cx",50).attr("fill","blue");
